price: አደምም ከጌታው ቃላቶችን ተቀበለ፡፡ በርሱ ላይም (ጌታው ጸጸትን በመቀበል) ተመለሰለት፤ እነሆ እርሱ ጸጸትን ተቀባይ አዛኝ ነውና፡፡
arabic: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fatalaqqā ādamu min rabbihi kalimātin fatāba ʿalayhi innahu huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
